alert.note: Alert for Grant; Roberts (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 20 at 8:22AM MDT until April 26 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Dakota...Minnesota... Minnesota River near Big Stone Lake affecting Big Stone, Roberts and Grant Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Minnesota River at Ortonville affecting Big Stone County. .For sites with a river forecast, the forecast includes precipitation through the next 24 hours. Any future precipitation could affect the forecasts. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Minnesota River Big Stone Lake. * WHEN...Until Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 971.6 feet, Water reaches shoreline homes on Shady Oak Drive. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 971.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:30 AM CDT Thursday was 972.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning and continue falling to 971.3 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 971.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr. The next statement will be issued Friday afternoon by 530 PM CDT.
